cs351.project2

Class FitnessCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs351.project2.FitnessCalculator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FitnessFunction

    public class FitnessCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
implements FitnessFunction
    Given a target image and a genome, this will calculate the fitness (but not set it) for the genome in question.

      Returns the maximum fitness for a Genome as a non-normalized integer.

      • generateFitness

        public double generateFitness(EvolutionEngine engine,
                              Genome genome)
        Takes the given genome, compares it to the target genome and outputs a normalized fitness value.
        Specified by:
        generateFitness in interface FitnessFunction
        Parameters:
        genome - genome to generate a fitness for
        engine - EvolutionEngine reference for callbacks
        Returns:
        normalized fitness for the given genome

      • getMaxFitness

        public int getMaxFitness()
        Returns the maximum fitness for a Genome as a non-normalized integer. This can be used to undo a normalized fitness (generateFitness(genome) * getMaxFitness() = non-normalzed fitness of a genome).
        Specified by:
        getMaxFitness in interface FitnessFunction
        Returns:
        maximum fitness for any genome as used by this fitness function
